storyBeats.title: Tauremar
storyBeats.description: Tauremar is the elven nation nestled in the high branches of Faladrin Forest.

storyBeats.title: A Forest in Danger
storyBeats.description: Someone is harming the forest with poison, fire, and death.

storyBeats.title: The Forestspeaker
storyBeats.description: Findorian, the Forestspeaker, was exiled from the Tetyayath, the druid circle of Tauremar. None will say why.

storyBeats.title: The Call to Adventure
storyBeats.description: Findorian believes the time has come for elves to eschew their isolation. But first he must prove that the elves need outside help.

storyBeats.title: The Verdant Watch
storyBeats.description: Findorian sends you to Lethariel, whose watchpost clings to the blighted edge of Tauremar.

storyBeats.title: Vorenthas the Hollowed
storyBeats.description: An exiled druid feeds the rot from a reliquary carved into the roots themselves.

storyBeats.title: A Plea to Valewyn
storyBeats.description: Tauremar must ask the nearby human kingdom of Valewyn for aid before the blight consumes all.

periods.name: night
periods.enterMessage: The leaves rustle gently as the twinkling light fades through the tree canopy.
periods.exitMessage: The gloom of the nighttime forest lifts as the first rays of light poke through the trees.

rooms.name: The Awakening
rooms.description: You stand next to the great old trunk of Cuivealda. The light is dim, as the dense, high canopy that forms Tauremar covers the sky. There is little ground cover, and the forest floor is a desolate place of perpetual twilight.

timePeriods.name: night
dusk
timePeriods.description:
It's hard to see past the closest trees in the waning light. You can still
make out a path leading east.
timePeriods.enterMessage: The ambient light dims as the smattering of sunlight turns a dark orange.

rooms.name: Watcher's Platform
rooms.description: This rough platform is suspended above Verdant Watch. It is tied to tree trunks on all corners, and is densely camouflaged. The rope ladder extends upward.

rooms.name: A Dark Path Through the Woods
rooms.description:
This path through the forest is just out of sight of Cuivealda to the west.  The trees are densely packed on all sides except on the path, which continues east.  
  There is a hand-written note posted to a tree.

extraDescs.description:
Before you come see me, take some time and center yourself.
Be sure to ^*TRAIN^x your abilities and ^*PRACTICE^x your skills.
Never be afraid to seek ^*HELP^x if you lack understanding.
 
--F

rooms.name: A Dark Path Through the Woods
rooms.description: The path through the dark woods continues.  The way west leads back to Cuivealda, while the path continuing east leads to sunlight.
rooms.loxScript:
on_greet(vch) {
    if (vch.has_quest(12000)) {
        vch.send(
            "^jYour mentor has left you some gear to help you on your journey. It's inside a chest by the tree.^x",
            "^jTry the following commands:^x",
            "^j- ^*OPEN CHEST^x",
            "^j- ^*LOOK IN CHEST^x",
            "^j- ^*TAKE ALL FROM CHEST^x",
            "^j- ^*EQUIP ALL^x",
            "^jYou can also look at your inventory with:^x",
            "^j- ^*EQ^j (short for ^*EQUIPMENT^j)^x",
            "^j- ^*INV^j (short for ^*INVENTORY^j)^x",
            "^jYou can see the effect of donning this gear by viewing your stats:^x",
            "^j- ^*SCORE^j (which you can abbreviate to ^*SC^j)^x")
    }
}

rooms.name: Verdant Refuge
rooms.description: Here in the tree canopy high above Verdant Watch, dense foliage conceals a cluster of buildings suspended upon thick branches. Their entrances in are each direction.

rooms.name: The Training Ground
rooms.description: Dappled sunlight breaks through the canopy in this clearing.  A patch of grass grows, green and vibrant, in the center.  Dark pathways through the trees go out in all directions.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
There is only a glimmer of light from the clearing to the south. Otherwise, the forest floor is almost completely obscured by the high canopy of trees.  You can see signs of some sort of blight that is infecting plant
and animal alike.  Tree trunks are turning ashen white, and there are carcasses of hairless creatures strewn about.
  The sickened forest extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description: The woods grow more dark and impenetrable in this direction.  Signs of the blight are much clearer here than to the east.  It's hard to believe that the very trees that hold Tauremar aloft are rotting like this.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description: The woods grow even darker here.  You can hear the strange, agonizing cries of blighted forest creatures all around you.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
This is the farthest end of the poisoned forest.  The trees grow too
densely to proceed in any other direction by east or south.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
The horrible blight has turned these tree trunks completely white.  The
normal twilight of the Faladrin Forest has turned even darker, as if they
sickness of the forest is making it worse, somehow.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
This is as far back as the navigable portion this area of the Faladrin
Forest goes.  Beyond, the trees are too dense to proceed.  This area has
more sickened trees, many covered in what appear to be... blisters?  Fleshy
pustules that grow and then seem to burst with effluent.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
The ground and tree trunks here are covered in strange black mushrooms. 
It seems ill-advised to come in contact with them.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
The blighted trees here are covered in some sort of sticky ichor.  The
area has a distinctly unpleasant odor.

rooms.name: The Poisoned Woods
rooms.description:
The poison infecting the forest has twisted the trees here.  Branches
seem limp and soft, and yet still hold themselves up somehow.  When you turn
your head, you can see them start to undulate as they pass beyond your
sight.

rooms.name: Threshold of Needles
rooms.description:
The rope causeway leading from Cuivealda narrows into a strip of woven needles.
Splinters hang in the air like pollen and sting your lungs with the bite of resin.
From the east you hear a hornbeat smothered beneath a wall of strained silence.

rooms.name: Verdant Watch
rooms.description:
A lattice of branches rises here into a rough platform where scouts nest between the trunks.
Strips of woven bark hang like banners, their sigils muted by ash drifting through the air.
Every creak of rope or armor is quickly smothered by the oppressive quiet of the diseased woods.

rooms.name: Splintered Causeway
rooms.description:
The narrow path twists between half-dead trunks that cling to one another for support.
Resinous ropes snap beneath your boots and reform moments later, as though the forest refuses to choose a shape.
Sickly green steam seeps from cracks in the bark and drifts toward the south.

rooms.name: Sagging Canopy
rooms.description:
Here the canopy droops low enough to brush your shoulders, each leaf slick with a humming sheen of blight.
Vines crackle underfoot like old bone, and currents of cold air leak up from the south.
Every breath tastes faintly of copper and smoke.

rooms.name: Ember-Scorched Hollow
rooms.description:
The trunks around this hollow are charred black, yet no ember ever truly dies; heat shivers in the air without flame.
A dozen shattered idols of the Tetyayath litter the ground, their stone hearts sluiced in tar.
The hollow opens east toward a deeper glow and up toward a silent watch ledge.

rooms.name: Resin Chasm
rooms.description:
The forest floor opens into a sink where rivers of molten sap cascade and harden in jagged sheets.
Bones of beasts and elves alike are trapped within the amber, mouths frozen mid-warning.
The chasm continues east beneath a line of weeping trees and south into a choking mire.

rooms.name: Weeping Copse
rooms.description:
A tight stand of trees sobs thick strings of black resin that stitch the air like harp strings.
Each impact against the earth produces a dull, painful thrum that lingers in your teeth.
The path east descends into a carved reliquary pulsing with distant chants.

rooms.name: Watcher's Ledge
rooms.description:
This elevated platform connects several guardian trees and offers a sweeping look over the blighted approaches.
Lanterns of pale fungus glow softly, illuminating maps carved into the bark beneath your hands.
The ledge drops south to the Verdant Watch and down into the scorched hollow below.

rooms.name: Shadowed Mustering
rooms.description:
Low platforms jut from the trunks here, chewed by claws and acid as though armies have paced in frustration.
Tattered cords and discarded charms hint at scouts who broke and ran before finishing their watch.
The muttering of unseen creatures rises from the east like fevers.

rooms.name: Needle Spiral
rooms.description:
A spiral ramp of braided pine needles descends here, anchored by spears of amber jutting from the soil.
Each step puffs a haze of spores that drift toward the east, hungry for warm lungs.
The ramp connects west to the staging ground and east to a yawning fungal den.

rooms.name: Mycelial Den
rooms.description:
Thick curtains of fungus narrow this den into a maze of damp chambers.
Each curtain shivers even when no wind touches it, responding instead to distant heartbeats.
Threads of pallid light drift east into a mire of bile and rot.

rooms.name: Suffocating Mire
rooms.description:
This mire clings to your boots with every step, exhaling bubbles of venomous vapor.
Slender reeds have been cut into whistles that now wheeze endlessly in the fetid air.
You can climb north back toward the resin chasm or west into the mycelial den.

rooms.name: Hollow Reliquary
rooms.description:
Roots arch overhead to form a half-circle reliquary carved with the Creeds, now gouged and repainted in tar.
The air hums with layered chanting that bleeds from the east, each voice twisted with pain.
Stagnant pools reflect you as a stranger with bark for skin.

rooms.name: Bilefall Hollow
rooms.description:
A waterfall of bile pours from the canopy here, evaporating before it ever touches the ground.
The hiss it produces masks the shuffle of creatures lurking just beyond sight.
Only the path north through the crying copse remains safe to traverse.

rooms.name: Vorenthas' Rotunda
rooms.description:
A circular chamber has been carved wholesale from the heartwood, polished until it mirrors the sky.
Chains of bone and iron dangle from the ceiling, each hooked into the veins of the tree.
A lone dais of blackened roots waits for the exile who dares to crown himself judge of the forest.

rooms.name: Fractured Lifeline
rooms.description:
Frayed lifelines of braided silk snap back and forth across this gap, severed during Vorenthas' ritual.
The forest around you groans, struggling to knit the wound faster than the blight can widen it.
Eastward, sunlight breaks through, hinting at the border and whoever might answer your plea.

rooms.name: Edge of Faladrin
rooms.description:
The canopy finally parts, revealing distant human watchfires flickering beyond the low hills of Valewyn.
A narrow bridge of woven bark reaches east, unfinished yet thrumming with stored power.
Envoy Calendor keeps vigil here, ready to guide messengers through the breach.

rooms.name: Road to Valewyn
rooms.description:
The path ahead dips toward misty foothills where the banners of Valewyn wait to receive Tauremar's plea.
For now the bridge ends here, its final span unfinished until the treaty is sealed.
You can still look west and see the glow of Faladrin clinging stubbornly to life.

mobiles.name: verdant scout
mobiles.longDescr: A Verdant Scout stands here, scanning the gloomy forest with their bow at the ready.

mobiles.name: findorian forestspeaker
mobiles.longDescr: Findorian, the Forestspeaker, kneels in the grassy clearing, gazing intently at the dark woods surrounding you.

mobiles.name: sick deer
mobiles.longDescr: A sick deer drags a limp leg along the ground.
mobiles.description:
This deer has been poisoned, and is near death.  Its eyes are bloodshot
and crazed.  It eyes you warily.

mobiles.name: blighted fox
mobiles.longDescr: A hairless, blighted fox twitches and stares at you.
mobiles.description:
This fox has lost all of its hair, and whatever senses it has.  It
twitches and scratches nervously.  It is clearly in great discomfort.

mobiles.name: rabid bobcat
mobiles.longDescr: A rabid bobcat is here, biting and attacking anything it can.
mobiles.description:
This bobcat is clearly crazed and in incredible pain.  You need to put it
down before it puts you down!

mobiles.name: crazed black bear
mobiles.longDescr: A crazed black bear is howling in anger and pain.
mobiles.description:
This black bear is covered in oozing pustules.  It is obviously in pain,
and lashing out.  It needs to be put down.

mobiles.name: wild weasel
mobiles.longDescr: A wild weasel runs around, foaming at the mouth.
mobiles.description:
This weasel has been infected with something and is flitting all around
you, leaving a trail of sickly green slobber and mucus.

mobiles.name: mutant coyote
mobiles.longDescr: A mutant, blood-drenched coyote is here, screaming.
mobiles.description:
This horribly mutated coyote's fur is matted with blood.  Given its open
wounds and sores, you imagine a not-insignificant amount of it is its own.

mobiles.name: angry badger
mobiles.longDescr: An angry badger is here, howling in pain.
mobiles.description:
This temperamental beast is covered in blisters and sores.  It seems
quite upset.

mobiles.name: feral rabbit
mobiles.longDescr: A feral rabbit is here, gnawing on what appears to be an elven femur.
mobiles.description:
Is that an elven femur in its mouth?  This rabbit is a menace!  You know
what to do.

mobiles.name: agonized boar
mobiles.longDescr: An agonized boar is here, randomly charging and striking trees.
mobiles.description:
This boar is clearly in pain, and taking it out on the entire forest.  It
is randomly charging trees and striking them with its tusks.  You can see
the body of other creatures strewn about it that it has gored to death.

mobiles.name: lethariel verdant scout
mobiles.longDescr: Lethariel crouches amid woven watchposts, eyes never leaving the darkened forest.
mobiles.description:
Lethariel wears barkbound armor slick with sap and fresh soot.
Her hands rest on a slender spear etched with travel routes leading toward human lands.

mobiles.name: ashen briarthrall
mobiles.longDescr: An ashen briarthrall drags thorned limbs through the path.
mobiles.description:
Knotted briars twine around the husk of a once-graceful stag, forcing it to move like a puppet.
Its eyes glow with a flat, red hunger that ignores pain.

mobiles.name: resinbound sentinel
mobiles.longDescr: A resinbound sentinel sways here, listening for intruders.
mobiles.description:
This warped elf is entombed in amber up to the shoulders, yet still lashes out with jagged shards.
Splinters of shattered duty cling to the markings on its armor.

mobiles.name: weeping treant husk
mobiles.longDescr: A weeping treant husk groans as resin floods from its bark.
mobiles.description:
The treant's limbs have collapsed inward, forcing it to crawl on melted knuckles.
Black tears of sap pour constantly from knots that once housed sparrows.

mobiles.name: mycelial stalker
mobiles.longDescr: A mycelial stalker scuttles through the shadows, leaving glowing spores.
mobiles.description:
Fungal plates cover this creature's back, each pulsing with trapped breath.
It splits and reforms as it charges, never fully choosing a shape.

mobiles.name: vorenthas hollowed exile
mobiles.longDescr: Vorenthas the Hollowed stands on a dais of blackened roots, eyes fever-bright.
mobiles.description:
Vorenthas' once-silver hair is threaded with resin cords that pull against his skull.
He clutches a thornlash grown from the very reliquary he seeks to command.

mobiles.name: envoy calendor
mobiles.longDescr: Envoy Calendor waits at the edge of Faladrin, cloak lined with human sigils.
mobiles.description:
Calendor bears both Tauremar's crest and the golden sun of Valewyn.
He studies every traveler carefully before granting a nod toward the east.

objects.name: shirt linen tauremar
objects.description: A linen shirt of Tauremar lies on the ground.

objects.name: cloak linen tauremar
objects.description: A linen cloak of Tauremar is discarded here.

objects.name: cap linen tauremar
objects.description: A linen cap of Tauremar is on the ground.

objects.name: pants linen tauremar
objects.description: Linen pants of Tauremar lie here.

objects.name: shoes leather tauremar
objects.description: Leather shoes of Tauremar are lying on the ground.

objects.name: gloves hide simple
objects.description: Simple gloves made of hide lay here.

objects.name: belt hemp rope simple
objects.description: A belt of hemp rope lays discarded.

objects.name: chest oak stout
objects.description: A stout oak chest is nestled between the roots a great tree trunk.

objects.name: phial amber resin sample
objects.shortDescr: an amber phial of tainted resin
objects.description: An amber phial of tainted resin rests here.

objects.name: findorian barkbound writ
objects.description: A barkbound writ glows softly here.

objects.name: mantle barkscale
objects.description: A mantle of barkscale armor is folded here.

objects.name: thornlash blade
objects.description: A thornlash blade thrums with barely restrained sap.

quests.name: An Old Friend
quests.entry:
Before you step out into the greater world, you must be trained.  To that
end, your old mentor Findorian has has taken the responsibility to ensure
you are properly made ready.  He waits for you just to the east of
Cuivealda.

quests.name: A Preserver's Burden
quests.entry: Findorian needs help culling the sick and ailing creatures in the poisoned woods of the Faladrin Forest.  The best thing you can do right now is to end their suffering.  Be warned however; many of them are twisted and violent.

quests.name: Scout's Counsel
quests.entry:
Findorian cannot leave Cuivealda, so he needs you to report to Lethariel at the Verdant Watch.
She studies the blight's movements and will point you toward the next wound that needs healing.

quests.name: Proof of Rot
quests.entry:
Lethariel needs a sample of the thinking blight. Travel through the resin chasm to the weeping copse and collect
the resin that pours from a treant husk so she can learn who commands it.

quests.name: The Hollowed Exile
quests.entry:
The resin sings for Vorenthas, the exile who refuses to let Tauremar seek help. Track him to the hollow reliquary and end his ritual
before he feeds the entire forest to the blight. Return to Findorian once the deed is done.

quests.name: Beyond Faladrin
quests.entry:
Findorian's writ must reach the human kingdom of Valewyn. Deliver it to Envoy Calendor at the edge of Faladrin so he can open
the bridge and prepare the humans for your arrival. This will be the first step toward saving both forests.
